content: 1HoDLCLUB Litecoin CasinoWelcome everyone to the Official 1HoDLCLUB Copper Litecoin poker Chips Sale!First I would like to thank all the people who participated in the previous sale! thank you for your enormous trust and support! it is really much appreciated!This is the penultimate sale of solo chips, the last being silver chips.this is the official sale of 1HoDLCLUB Copper Litecoin poker chips, this sale is dedicated to solo chips, serial LGB001 to LGC190. [Chips 1 through 21 are serialized; 1HODLCLUB, HODL, TOTHEMOON! some are in Hologram Silver others in Gold, from chips 22 to 190 the holograms are serialized LBG.. but there may be surprises with special holograms but you will only be surprised when you receive your chips. ]Each chips is serialized "LGB...", on this version, the front hologram is gold, the one behind it is silver !Solo chips means that there are no rolls, whether you take 10 or 21 chips you will have 10 or 21 solo chips in air tites.All the chips have the denomination 0.1 LTC and are sold loaded [Of course they will be loaded once they reach the hands of their new owners]Since this is the official sale, there is no limit on the purchase of chips per member. Serial Numbers cannot be choose, first arrived, first served.1HoDLCLUB Copper Litecoin Poker chipsMintage : 190 -  157 SOLD / 33 AVAILABLEMaterial : CopperSize : 39mmThickness : 3.2mmWeight : 1ozDenomination : 0.1 LTCSerial : LGC001 to LGC190The price is 40$ per chip + 0.1 LTC loading per chip + shipping costThe first orders will be sent on Monday, December 5, 2022!Shipping cost [Express + Tracking] :Worldwide:1 - 5 chips : 18$6 - 15 chips : 23$16 - 25 chips : 33$Europe:1-5 coins - 15$6 - 15 chips : 20$16 - 25 chips : 26$Payment Adress : You can pay the chips in BTC and the loading separately, or all in LTC!BTC : bc1qald2sv68sdlra5arl72vfs5r4t4xqvv2psvqmsLTC : ltc1qdeqs4ale9uaa46ep9ts5mq6waywjhklydhmukdAfter payment please send me the following information :TxID :Amount of BTC : Chips / ShippingAmount of LTC : LoadingShipping details : use privnote if possible[If you can include email to details it's better for customs.]Reference list : Public addresses will be added tomorrow evening!Code:Serial           BTC Address1 LRBQQA8zbbbugP389tVCZvyAPTsqBnZKya2 LgKmMXr8Ky1eN9f6WJHJPoCj8BXWDK1UNd3 LbdEHNXbUYxJ1rstSaxnXFCB5RwxFvBnJn4 LT7UmCtzwHaKB7Li37vtW3tsRkpVu17v6X5
